definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
abbr. for Xiamen or Amoy 廈門|厦门[Xia4 men2], Fujian

pinyin: Niu3 yue1 Di4 guo2 Da4 sha4

sentences.english: Excuse me , Could you tell me the way to the Empery edifice?
sentences.chinese: 勞駕，先生。請問帝國大廈怎麼走？

sentences.english: The height of the Empire State Building belittles the houses around it.
sentences.chinese: 帝國大廈的高度使它周遭的房屋顯得渺小。

sentences.english: In front of the Empire State Building is a long rectangular wading pool.
sentences.chinese: 帝國大廈前面是一個長方形的淺水池。

sentences.english: At present, ESB is mostly filled with rentable space for businesses.
sentences.chinese: 目前，帝國大廈內絕大部分爲出租的寫字間。

sentences.english: The Empire State Building has 102 stories.
sentences.chinese: 帝國大廈有一百零二層。

sentences.english: For manyyearyears it was the tallest building in the world.
sentences.chinese: 許多年間，帝國大廈都是世界最高樓。

sentences.english: View from Empire State Building to Chrysler Building and Queensboro Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 從帝國大廈向克萊斯勒大廈與皇后大橋眺望。

sentences.english: In the scientific movie King Kong, the Empire State Building impresses the audience.
sentences.chinese: 在科幻電影《金剛》中，帝國大廈讓觀衆印象深刻。

sentences.english: 1931 - The Empire State Building is dedicated in New York City.
sentences.chinese: 1931年的今天，帝國大廈在紐約市啓用。

definition: Davos (Swiss ski resort)/Davos world economic forum (WEF)
Brooklyn, borough of New York City

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Jing1 ji4 Lun4 tan2
